title: Man beaten to death
body: A man was beaten to death allegedly by a group of local people over allegations of his involvement in criminal activities at Begumganj in Noakhali on Monday. The deceased is Fakhrul Islam Manju, 25, accused in several cases related to criminal activities, said the police. Quoting local people, Begumganj police officer-in-charge MA Bari said that Manju was beaten up due to his various criminal activities in the area. ‘He died on the spot. The body was recovered and sent to the morgue at 250-bedded Noakhali General Hospital,’ he said. Taking legal action regarding the incident was under process, the police official added. Victim’s family, however, alleged that Manju was killed by ‘a teen gang’ members due to previous enmity.
